sentences.english: Part the of the allure of subversive art like this is the shock value. Why would a lovable character be welding a bloody knife?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼一個嬌滴滴的形象要變成拿着把血淋淋的刀？

sentences.english: In the season that the day freezes coldly, the hair was become sweet brittle article.
sentences.chinese: 天寒地凍的季節裏，頭髮成了嬌滴滴的易碎品。

sentences.english: See that the Huazhuanghe in typically covered with jackets to your coquetry .
sentences.chinese: 看那個披上外衣的化妝盒在嬌滴滴地向你撒嬌。

sentences.english: He speaks in a cutesy voice on behalf of the dog.
sentences.chinese: 他尖着嗓子嬌滴滴的扮狗狗說話真是讓我無語了。

sentences.english: Long hair was traditionally regarded as a sign of femininity.
sentences.chinese: 長頭髮在傳統上被認爲是嬌滴滴的象徵。
